name: Hamburger
cookingMethod: Season ground beef with salt and pepper, form into patties, and grill or cook on a griddle. Assemble on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, and onion.

name: Macaroni and cheese
cookingMethod: Cook macaroni, make a roux with butter and flour, then whisk in milk and cheese. Stir in cooked macaroni.

name: Hot dog
cookingMethod: Grill or cook hot dog, then assemble on a bun with ketchup, mustard, and relish.

name: Buffalo wings
cookingMethod: Fry chicken wings, then toss in a mixture of hot sauce and melted butter. Serve with celery and blue cheese dressing.

name: Chocolate Pancakes
cookingMethod: Mix together flour, milk, egg, baking powder, and melted butter. Cook on a griddle or frying pan until golden brown.

name: Bacon
cookingMethod: Cook bacon in a skillet until crispy. Drain on paper towels before serving.

name: Grilled steak
cookingMethod: Season steak with salt, pepper, and minced garlic. Brush with olive oil and grill to desired doneness.

name: Chicken pot pie
cookingMethod: Cook chicken, carrots, peas, and onion in a pot with chicken broth and thyme. Transfer to a baking dish and cover with pie crust. Bake until crust is golden brown.

name: Clam chowder
cookingMethod: Cook bacon and onion in a pot, then add chopped potatoes and clam juice. Simmer until potatoes are tender, then add chopped clams and heavy cream. Serve hot.

name: Fried chicken
cookingMethod: Dredge chicken in seasoned flour, dip in a mixture of buttermilk and beaten eggs, then coat in flour again. Fry in hot oil until golden brown and cooked through.

name: Potato salad
cookingMethod: Boil potatoes until tender, then mix with a dressing of mayonnaise, mustard, diced onion, and chopped celery. Serve cold.

name: Sloppy Joe
cookingMethod: Cook ground beef, onion, and green pepper in a skillet. Stir in ketchup, brown sugar, and a splash of Worcestershire sauce. Serve on hamburger buns.

name: Mac and cheese
cookingMethod: Cook macaroni until al dente, then stir in a sauce made from melted butter, flour, and milk. Add shredded cheddar cheese and stir until melted and combined. Serve hot.

name: Barbecue ribs
cookingMethod: Season pork ribs with a mixture of brown sugar, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Grill or bake until cooked through, then brush with barbecue sauce and grill or broil until caramelized and sticky.

name: Pancakes
cookingMethod: Mix together flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl. In another bowl, whisk together milk and eggs, then stir into the dry ingredients. Cook on a hot griddle or skillet until golden brown on both sides.

name: Tacos
cookingMethod: Cook ground beef in a skillet, then stir in taco seasoning and a splash of water. Warm tortillas, then fill with the beef mixture, lettuce, and shredded cheese. Serve hot.

name: Cornbread
cookingMethod: Combine cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. In another bowl, whisk together milk, eggs, and melted butter, then stir into the dry ingredients. Pour into a greased baking dish and bake until golden brown.

name: Jambalaya
cookingMethod: Cook andouille sausage in a pot until browned, then remove and set aside. In the same pot, cook diced onion and bell pepper until soft. Stir in uncooked rice, diced tomatoes, and a mixture of chicken broth, Worcestershire sauce, and Cajun seasoning. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender. Stir in cooked shrimp and the reserved sausage, then serve hot.
